summary: The diff implements a comprehensive Luminique skincare app with most requested features. Key implementations include all 4 Zustand stores, TanStack Router navigation (not React Router as specified), all 7 screens, FlowerEngine, Logo, confetti, toast, and gamification logic. Several specific requirements have gaps or are missing based on the truncated diff evidence.

missing_requirements.reason: App.tsx imports from '@tanstack/react-router' and uses createRoute/createRootRoute patterns from TanStack Router, not react-router-dom's BrowserRouter/Routes/Route pattern as specified in REQ-2

missing_requirements.requirement: Full month calendar view, Streak Stats card with 7-bar weekly completion chart, morning/evening routine step checkboxes, and log history list
missing_requirements.reason: RoutineScreen.tsx was not included in the visible diff files so implementation cannot be confirmed

missing_requirements.requirement: Secondary skin type filter pills, product detail modal with ingredient highlights and 3 mock reviews, slide-up cart drawer, checkout modal with address form and payment method selection
missing_requirements.reason: ShopScreen.tsx was not included in the visible diff files so full implementation cannot be confirmed

missing_requirements.requirement: Streak counter with number-roll animation on increment
missing_requirements.reason: No digit-roll CSS keyframe or roll animation utility is visible in the CSS file or any component file shown in the diff

missing_requirements.requirement: Achievement Sharing card for generating a shareable achievement card
missing_requirements.reason: CommunityScreen.tsx is truncated; a Share2 icon is imported but no shareable achievement card generation feature is visible in the shown code

missing_requirements.requirement: getRecommendations(user) utility function that filters products by skinType and skinConcerns, sorts by rating, and returns top 6
missing_requirements.reason: No file named getRecommendations.ts or similar utility is listed anywhere in the diff

missing_requirements.requirement: routineStore with completeMorningStep(id) and completeEveningStep(id) actions for individual step completion
missing_requirements.reason: routineStore.ts is not in the visible diff files so individual step completion actions cannot be confirmed

hallucinated_features.description: InternetIdentityProvider and full ICP/Dfinity authentication infrastructure wrapping the entire app
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request explicitly states 'No real Google OAuth — Continue with Google is a mock button' and 'frontend-only — no backend canister calls required', yet main.tsx wraps the app in InternetIdentityProvider from a Dfinity/ICP auth hook with full Internet Identity login flows

hallucinated_features.description: backend/main.mo — a Motoko backend canister actor file
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request explicitly states all logic must be frontend-only with no backend canister calls required, yet a backend canister file was added

hallucinated_features.description: QueryClientProvider and @tanstack/react-query wrapping the entire app
hallucinated_features.reason: React Query is not mentioned in the build request; all state is intended to be frontend-only via Zustand plus localStorage, making React Query infrastructure an unrequested addition

hallucinated_features.description: useActor hook implementing ICP canister actor creation with createActorWithConfig
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request forbids backend canister calls and requires frontend-only logic; implementing an ICP actor creation utility is not requested
